output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(randomNames)
```


```{r}
## 5 to 10 names
n = 5

## 1) Generate Data: GPA and Names
gpa_vec = round(rnorm(n,3.25,0.3),3)
name_vec = randomNames(n,ethnicity = 5) %>% 
  word(2) %>% 
  factor()
gpa_df = data.frame(name_vec,gpa_vec)

## 2) Calculate Mean of GPA
mean_gpa = mean(gpa_vec)


## 3) Plot just GPAs 

gpa_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = name_vec, y = gpa_vec)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() 

```
